segments.text: I notice the bright light streaming through the open window, illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world looks so peaceful, yet the scene inside feels increasingly chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so entranced by her dishwashing, she doesn't perceive the trouble brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a growing dread as I watch the boy climb higher on the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination to reach the cookie jar is both admirable and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen if he falls?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, she looks so expectant, like she believes they're about to enjoy a great secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I ache at the thought that she might be disappointed if things go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked high, but none of it matters if they all end up hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mundane kitchen scene is filled with unrecognized risks, yet it appears so normal.
segments.speaker: PAR
